t: Linchpin: Are You Indispensable? by Seth Godin | Goodreads
s: According to Godin, one of the only ways to survive this new world of work is by becoming a linchpin. After all, think about the people who usually survive the layoffs, get the bonuses and the perks others don't. They are people considered to be essential to the organization or the brand.
